name: Spaghetti Squash Gratin
recipeIngredient: 1 (2-3 lb) spaghetti squash, halved and seeded

recipeInstructions.text: Microwave squash (one half at a time, skin side up) on high until tender (10-12 minutes). Set aside, covered, until cool enough to handle (10-15 minutes).
Run tines of fork lengthwise over cut surface of squash to loosen spaghetti-like strands; scoop out strands. If necessary, drain excess liquid. Set aside.
Combine garlic, thyme, parsley, salt, pepper, creme fraiche, and 2/3 cup cheese in small bowl. Fold into squash; place in casserole dish. Top with remaining cheese.
Bake 20 minutes or until lightly browned.
